au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: Short
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200,300) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) # Select beam stop selBs(2)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(260)
